title: 'Donors choose - like' application
description: It is difficult to donate in charitable institutions because of transparency issues, corruption and traceability.
solution: The beneficiary request for help by filling up the particular forms. Request will then be displayed on the website. Donors choose to award.
experience:
I maintained a few websites but not fluent on programming (e.g. Marlowe,etc.). 

Looking for like-minded individuals to set-up a team.
